motion.author: newmediagallerynw
motion.title: Change to the Terms of Service
motion.description:
We would like to propose a change to the Terms of Service that would allow members to have the option to opt specific content or all their content out of use by CubeCommons for any activity beyond the primary use of the platform: viewing of content by audiences. Mainly, not to use artists’ images, artworks, intellectual property for advertising and marketing purposes.

Part our loan agreements with the artists we work with have clauses that prevent their images, artworks, and identities from being altered in any way. As a gallery institution, we have the ability to maintain that control with content we share through our website. Extending that content to CubeCommons puts another entity inside the relationship between the artists, us as the gallery, and the audiences we engage. It would benefit NMG as users of CubeCommons to be able to have an option to designate certain content as unavailable to be used by the platform for advertising and marketing purposes. When uploading content, we would like to be able to opt out of even partial use of the content so as the maintain the integrity of the artist’s intellectual property.
